pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flexible Bayesian Model Selection and Model Averaging // Implements the Mode Jumping Markov Chain Monte Carlo algorithm described in doi:10.1016/j.csda.2018.05.020 and its Genetically Modified counterpart described in doi:10.1613/jair.1.13047 as well as the sub-sampling versions described in doi:10.1016/j.ijar.2022.08.018 for flexible Bayesian model selection and model averaging.
